thread.title: High immigration to an area actually reduces NHS waiting times there, research finds
thread.title_full: High immigration to an area actually reduces NHS waiting times there, research finds - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: High immigration to an area actually reduces NHS waiting times there, research finds
text: Mass immigration to an area actually helps reduce NHS hospital waiting times there, new research has found. Academics at the University of Oxford found that waiting times for outpatient health services actually fall when migrants move to an area, and that there is no evidence of any negative impact on elective services. The study looked at population data from 141 local authorities in England and compared it to NHS waiting time performance data covering 125 million hospital admissions. Read more
